biography: Nienke is a creator of interactive worlds and a master of game mechanics. As a Game Developer, she combines technical programming skill with a deep understanding of what makes an experience fun and engaging. She is a night owl who is most comfortable in the glow of a monitor, single-mindedly debugging code or designing the next challenging level. To her, life is a series of puzzles to be solved and systems to be mastered.

facial.skinColor: fair, often pale from staying indoors
facial.hairStyle: Shoulder-length, often unkempt and hidden under a large pair of headphones
facial.mouth: A thoughtful mouth, often slightly open in concentration

tattoos: A tattoo of the Triforce from The Legend of Zelda on the back of her left hand.

bodyDetails.abdomen: A soft belly from a sedentary lifestyle and junk food. Navel is an 'innie'.
bodyDetails.hands: Long fingers, nimble from years of keyboard and controller use. Nails are often unkempt.

quirks: Analyzes real-life situations based on game mechanics
Can live on coffee and determination
Has a collection of gaming-themed hoodies
Celebrates success by beating a difficult game boss
favoriteFoods: Anything that can be eaten with one hand while coding

relationships.katje-08: Romantically involved with Mila, they build worlds together
relationships.katje-17: Admires her artistic talent for concept art
